roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.global_chat_update_description:
Login via Smartschool ‚Äî goodbye spammers üëã
Usernames are now synced across multiple devices
Moderators can now ban users from the chat
Fresh batch of stickers added üéâ
roadmap.settings_update_description:
Expanded settings panel for currently fixed customisation options
More control over all features
roadmap.global_chat_update_2_description:
Plant sticker ‚Äî show off your plant to everyone
Replying to messages
Auto complete for stickers
roadmap.theme_update_description:
Fresh themes + user-submitted designs in a revamped UI
Save multiple custom themes (switch seamlessly)
Gradient backgrounds
roadmap.profile_update_description:
Express yourself with custom profile pictures
Choose your own style and colours
roadmap.plant_update_description:
New plants unlockable by growth progress
Name your plant (give it personality!)
Seasonal decorations (e.g., Easter eggs, Christmas lights)
Auto-watering when it rains (no more forgetfulness!)
roadmap.results_grid_description: Already fully compatible with Smarter & Smartest Smartschool.
roadmap.mobile_app_description: Months-to-years dev time + extra costs = not viable üíµ
roadmap.daily_api: Daily API widget (e.g., dad jokes, trivia)
roadmap.messages_behavior: Messages behavior now match results on small screens
roadmap.onboarding: Onboarding Quick Start (interactive guide for new users)
roadmap.customizable_iframes: Customizable iframes for fullscreen apps or widgets

guide.change_weather_location: How do I change my weather location?
guide.which_browsers: On which browsers can I install?
guide.instruction_allow_permissions: Download & then allow all the required permissions
guide.instruction_go_to_smartschool: Go to your Smartschool & refresh the page. Congratulation, your journey just started!
guide.instruction_open_settings: Click the Settings button in the top right
guide.instruction_try_settings: Try out some settings and watch them update in real-time
guide.instruction_close_settings_outside: Close the settings by clicking anywhere outside of the settings
guide.instruction_click_edit_button: Click the edit button at the top left to enter
guide.instruction_open_drawer_widgets: Open the drawer at the top to grab some widgets
guide.instruction_place_widgets: Place the widgets in existing panels or create new ones
guide.instruction_store_widgets: Store your widgets by dropping them back in the drawer
guide.instruction_open_quick_key: Open the quick menu using the : key
guide.instruction_lookup_function: Look up any function in quick menu, for example "planner"
guide.instruction_use_tab_enter: Use Tab to navigate and Enter to confirm your choice
guide.instruction_save_quicks: Use "quick add" to save a shortcut. Enter a name: (eg. google), then a value (URL): (e.g. https://google.com)
guide.instruction_change_weather: Click on the current location in the widget and type out your own location.
guide.instruction_blocked_install: On school laptops or school wifi, it might be blocked. Try a different browser or use Lite.
guide.instruction_smarter_compatible: Yes, both Smarter Smartschool and Smartest Smartschool are compatible But don't forget to disable the Smarter themes
guide.instruction_browsers: You can use any Chromium based browser like Opera or Edge. Firefox users can follow our guide on Discord.
guide.instruction_other_questions: You can reach out in our official Smartschool++ Discord server.

guide.open_quick_menu_key: Open the quick menu using the : key
guide.lookup_function_example: Look up any function in quick menu, for example "planner"
guide.tab_enter_navigation: Use Tab to navigate and Enter to confirm your choice
guide.quick_add_shortcut: Use "quick add" to save a shortcut. Enter a name: (eg. google), then a value (URL): (e.g. https://google.com)
guide.click_location_widget: Click on the current location in the widget and type out your own location.
guide.school_blocked: On school laptops or school wifi, it might be blocked. Try a different browser or use Lite.
guide.smarter_compatible: Yes, both Smarter Smartschool and Smartest Smartschool are compatible But don't forget to disable the Smarter themes

products.full_experience_description: The full experience ‚Äî with fun, personal touches.

about.sibe_description:
Hey! Sibe here üëã I created most of the widget system, the global chat and the quick menu, and made some small tweaks to the games üéÆ. Not everything we've made is equally useful ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è, but I think I speak for the whole team when I say we've learned incredibly much from this entire project üìöüí°.
For me, the most important thing is that the quality of this project is guaranteed, also for future generations.

‚Äì Sibe, developer & Rust-fan ü¶Äüíª
about.lukas_description:
Only do the things that give you energy, not the things that cost you energy. ‚ö°
These words stuck with me from a conversation with Jan Schuer, CEO of Smartschool. With that mindset, Smartschool++ remains great.
The Plantü™¥, Delijnüöå, the weatherüå¶Ô∏è and the official website... piece by piece projects I'm proud of that together shape Smartschool++. Thank you very much to everyone who has supported us since day one ‚ù§Ô∏è.

‚Äì Lukas, UI designer, developer & Radiohead-fan üìª
about.bjarne_description:
Hey hey, I'm Bjarne! My focus is on improving the user experience by fixing UI bugs üêõ and adding quality of life improvements ‚ú®. You see my work on almost every page,
even if it's not always immediately noticeable, you will undoubtedly feel the difference.
‚ù§Ô∏è to everyone who supports us and uses Smartschool++

‚Äì Bjarne, Experience coordinator, & Anime-fan üìª
